name: Red Wars
description:
Resolutiion's initial project name was "Red Wars". 

A lot changed, but it's still fun to see, that some parts of the final game were already in the first rough draft.

  • arrow keys: move
  • attack: y or z
  • dash: x
  • shoot: hold and release c

There is a timer at the end, so you can go for a speed run challenge.

!Beware! This demo might be buggy as f*** and can crash at all times...

... enjoy :)
